meanings.definition: A person who works on a ship.
meanings.sent1: The seaman helped steer the ship through the rough waters.
meanings.sent2: The seaman climbed the mast to adjust the sails.
meanings.sent3: The seaman accidentally dropped his hat overboard and had to fish it out.
meanings.sent4: The seaman's dedication to his duties was as steady as the ocean waves.
meanings.sent5: The seaman's knowledge of the sea was unmatched among the crew.

meanings.definition: A member of a ship's crew.
meanings.sent1: Every seaman aboard the vessel had a specific role to play.
meanings.sent2: The seaman worked alongside his fellow crew members to unload the cargo.
meanings.sent3: The seaman and the captain shared a laugh over a funny seagull incident.
meanings.sent4: The seaman's loyalty to his crewmates was unwavering.
meanings.sent5: The seaman's camaraderie with the crew made the long voyages more enjoyable.
